item.title: Motorcycle Front, Car Back?!
item.description: Take a look at this unusual vehicle with a motorcycle front and car back, showcasing creativity and engineering in custom cars.

media:content.media:description: Take a look at this unusual vehicle with a motorcycle front and car back, showcasing creativity and engineering in custom cars.

item.title: When Repossession Gets Personal
item.description: A routine repossession escalates as emotions rise, highlighting the challenges workers face in high-pressure situations.

item.title: $35K Truck or $15K Deal?
item.description: See how a potential truck purchase sparks negotiation, weighing price, value, and options to reach the best deal.

item.title: Call The Cops Or Spray?
item.description: Watch how a team navigates a difficult repossession, making careful decisions to resolve the situation safely and professionally.

item.title: Six Months No Payments?
item.description: A look at the challenges faced when car payments are missed for months, highlighting the realities of repossession and financial responsibility.

item.title: Troy’s Tough Negotiation Tactics: Will They Strike a Deal?
item.description: Watch Troy navigate a car deal with strategy and skill, showing how effective negotiation can influence the outcome.

item.title: This Repo Argument Got Personal Quickly
item.description: A routine vehicle repossession escalates as emotions run high, showing how quickly conflicts can develop on the job.

item.title: Would You Pay $30K for This Beauty?
item.description: Take a closer look at this vehicle and its features—see what makes it a potential $30K purchase for car enthusiasts.

item.title: Neighbor Buys The ’68 Chevy Buford
item.description: A classic 1968 Chevy Buford is sold to a neighbor, marking a memorable moment for car enthusiasts and the community.

item.title: This Truck Might Get Donated
item.description: A beloved vintage truck could find a new home through donation, showing the value of passion and giving over profit.

item.title: $2500 For A Porsche? Deal Made!
item.description: See how a Porsche changes hands in an unexpected cash deal, highlighting the negotiation and excitement of buying a car.

item.title: Pizza Delivery Turns Into Repo Fight
item.description: A routine pizza delivery takes an unexpected turn, showing how unpredictable situations can arise in everyday work.

item.title: 525 Horsepower Beast Coming Alive!
item.description: Watch this powerful truck roar to life, showcasing its 525-horsepower engine and impressive performance.

item.title: Fireworks That Made Canada Roar
item.description: Experience the energy and excitement as fireworks light up the sky, bringing crowds together for a memorable celebration in Canada.

item.title: He Almost Left It To Rot
item.description: A look at a forgotten classic car that was nearly lost to time, highlighting restoration potential and the thrill of discovering hidden automotive gems.

item.title: Upset Over One Offer?
item.description: A look at a car deal where a single offer sparks tension, highlighting negotiation dynamics and the emotions involved in buying and selling vehicles.

item.title: Can They Finish Buford In 3 Days?
item.description: A look at a high-pressure truck build, highlighting the teamwork, skill, and tight timeline needed to prepare for a car show in just three days.

item.title: He Refused The Repossession
item.description: A look at a tense vehicle repossession that didn’t go as planned, highlighting the challenges and unexpected moments faced by recovery agents.

item.title: Girlfriend Steps In… Bad Idea?
item.description: A look at an unexpected moment during a vehicle repossession when someone intervenes, highlighting tense situations and the challenges of the job.

item.title: No Oil No Water Still Runs
item.description: A look at a rugged truck build that keeps running despite missing fluids, highlighting durability, engineering, and the challenges of derby-style vehicles.
